casebody.data:
THE JEWISH HOME FOR THE ELDERLY OF FAIRFIELD COUNTY, INC. v. J. MICHAEL CANTORE, JR., CONSERVATOR (PERSON AND ESTATE OF DIANA KOSMINER), ET AL. The Supreme Court docket number is SC 16388. Elizabeth J. Stewart and Martha Everett Meng, in support of the petition. James J. Farrell, in opposition. Decided September 27, 2000

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
